mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congress may add to present commission for negotiation foreign treaties; self been proposed; [Ben] Franklin is secretary; lists expenses; asks if Short would be of party; servant taken from here would be expensive encumbrance; in cipher; cipher key attached and letter translated.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Franklin, Benjamin, 1706-1790
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1784 April 30, Annapolis, [Maryland], to William Short, n.p.
